page.title: 12Clubs in Norham
page.content: Both public houses in the village attract a good following of darts and domino players as well as holding meetings of the pigeon-racing enthusiasts and onion and leek clubs. A sports committee dedicate their efforts to a yearly quoits match, 5-a- side football competition for boys of the area, and a childrens activity day of fancy-dress and races. Having our own village school, we also have our own fund-raising Parent /Teacher association. As most of these organisations are voluntary, they depend on other members of the community for financial support. This is realised by a continuous calendar of coffee evenings, dances, discos, whist drives and fetes, which in themselves provide an excellent source of entertainment.
